name: Crush Bonbons
description:
Love playing Match-3 game? Solve sweet match-3 puzzles with Emily and crush bonbons! This is an exciting game that will keep you play all day!

HOW TO PLAY
-Just swap to match 3 bonbons and get a crush!
-Match more than 3 bonbons to get powerful boosters!
-Pay attention to the obstacles and collect toys!
-Crush bonbons with Emily’s help!

GAME FEATURES
-More than 3000+ levels to explore!
-Amazing activities to win big rewards!
-Solve jigsaw puzzles to get Emily’s story!
-Exquisite graphics and cute collection!
-Easy to get started but hard to master!
-Free to play at anytime anywhere!

Join the fantastic adventure now and have a CRUSH! If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to reach us at https://www.facebook.com/Crush-Bonbons-101134415390879
